{{Description|You and [[Paimon]] meet a certain strange student by the [[Wall of Samiel]] to southwest of the rainforest. She seems to be trying to some kind of mysterious creation...}}
'''Brewing Developments''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 3.6]].

==Event Details==
{{Domain Infobox
|displaytitle = no
|mapicon      = Icon Brewing Developments.png
|image        = Domain Purification Spring.png
|type         = Event
|region       = Sumeru
|area         = Ashavan Realm
|subarea      = Ruins of Dahri
|requiredAR   = 20
|description  = While conducting her research, Hajanad has discovered a new Domain with all sorts of opponents wandering within. This Domain provides all the research material she needs to test her Shock-Boiled Brews...
}}

===Duration===
* 2023/04/13 10:00:00 – 2023/04/24 03:59:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above

===Summary===
* During the first 8 days of the "Brewing Developments" event, one new challenge will be unlocked every 2 days.
* During each challenge, you can use the trial characters provided by the event or your own to complete 3 consecutive combat rounds.
* The Shock-Boiled Brew allocated for each round has 4 potential effects. The Shock-Boiling Device will automatically use the Shock-Boiled Brew and can randomly activate one or more effects for a certain period of time, providing tremendous support during combat.
* The goal of the challenge is to defeat as many opponents as possible within the time limit to score points. When the challenge ends, you will receive [[Primogem]]s, [[Talent Level-Up Material]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]], and [[Mora]] based on this score.
* Food and other items will not be available during these challenges.

===Tutorial===
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Tablet Analytics 1.png
|text1  = You must complete 3 consecutive challenge rounds during the "Brewing Developments" stages. Each challenge round requires you to {{Color|help|defeat opponents that will continuously appear within a time limit to accrue points}}. Your party setup can be changed between rounds to deal with different types of opponents. When the challenge ends, you will obtain test-related emblems based on your score.
|image2 = Tutorial Tablet Analytics 2.png
|text2  = The Shock-Boiling Device will automatically activate every 20s within the challenge, {{Color|help|activating 1 to 4 potential medicinal effects}}. These effects will grant potent combat buffs for a fixed duration. Each combat round will have different medicinal effects. Use them well to conduct combat quickly and effectively.
}}
